title: Add new person to admin cabinet
description: Sends an email to the specified Email ID for profile creation

Parameter.description: This is the account token generated by web/token endpoint
This is the token which u=you get while calling the admin/login apis
The role of the new user getting added
This should end with @therapyondemand.io
Absolute URL to which the api should redirect. Note the url should not end with "/"

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
            accountToken:<>
            sessionToken:<>
            role:<hr/sales>
            email:<email-address>@therapyondemand.io
            firstName:<>
            lastName:<>
            phone:<>
            callbackUrl:<>
}

examples.title: Success-Response:

name: PostAdminAdd_user

title: Get Profile info(Any User)
description: This Api is used to get profile info of a given profile

Parameter.description: This is the account token generated by web/token endpoint
This is the token which u=you get while calling the admin/login apis
This is the auto-generated id of the given user

examples.title: Request-Example:

200.description: Relative address to the backend. If /profile/xyz.png the absolute url will be http(s):///profile/xyz.png

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
        data:{
			id:<>
			firstName:<>
			lastName:<>
			email:<>
			role:<hr/sales>
			image:<>
			phone:<>
			lattitude:<>
			longitude:<>
			address:<>
			status:<0,1,2,3...>
		}
		message:"Data fetched successfully"
}

name: PostAdminGet_user

title: List users from Admin Cabinet
description: This Api is used to list the users with the given filters

Parameter.description: This is the account token generated by web/token endpoint
This is the token which u=you get while calling the admin/login apis
Search key if any. Or else empty
An Array of what all roles you want to see. Empty if there is no such filters.
An Array of accountStatus integer codes. See the codes in datamodel.ts file under the variable "accountStatus". Empty if no such filters
An integer representing the number of pages in the result. Each page will contain 10 results.

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
		accountToken:<>
		sessionToken:<>
		searchKey:"rahul"
		roles:["sales", "hr"] 
		status:[] 
		paging:0
}

200.description: Total number of pages in the list. Each page contains 10 entries

examples.title: Success-Response:

name: PostAdminList_users

title: Edit Profile Details
description: This Api is used to edit the users profile. Only put the parameters which you want to edit

Parameter.description: This is the account token generated by web/token endpoint
This is the token which u=you get while calling the admin/login apis

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
        accountToken:<>
		sessionToken:<>
		firstName:"FirstName",
		lastName:"LastName",
		phone:"Phone",
		image:<Base 64 encoded>,
		lattitude:<>
		longitude:<>
		address:<>
		password:{
			oldPassword:<>
			newPassword:<>
		}
}

examples.title: Success-Response:

name: PostEditProfile

title: My Profile Details
description: This Api is used to get the logged in users profile details

Parameter.description: This is the account token generated by web/token endpoint
This is the token which u=you get while calling the admin/login apis

examples.title: Request-Example:

200.description: Its give a relatice address of image.. for absolute combine it with the backend baseurl

examples.content:
{
       data:{
            role:<>
            fullName:<>
            firstName:<>
            lastName:<>
            email:<>
			image:<>
			phone:<>
			lattitude:<>
			longitude:<>
			address:<>
        }
        message:""
}

name: PostGetProfile

The new password that the user wants to set.
